# MKDistanceFormatter.Units.default

**Case**

The format uses the locale information to determine which units to use.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Discussion

Some locales mix metric and imperial units so don’t assume this means one or the other.

## Constants

- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.metric**: The format uses metric units.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.imperial**: The format uses imperial units.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.imperialWithYards**: The format uses imperial units that include measurements in yards.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.metric**: The format uses metric units.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.imperial**: The format uses imperial units.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.imperialWithYards**: The format uses imperial units that include measurements in yards.
